name: Quiet Basement
description:
You find yourself in a small room in a damp basement with no recollection of how you got there. The room shows signs that someone has been living here for quite a while, you don't want to stay to find out who, all you know is you have to get out as fast as you can. Will you be able to get out? 

The game was made over the span of three weeks with the intent of capturing the essence, atmosphere and feel of a movie scene. In our case we chose a scene from the movie: "A Quiet Place" and decided to mix it with some elements of P.T.

Play with headphones for the optimal experience!

Controls

WASD / ZQSD to move

Hold left mouse button to interact.

Developers

Ali "PrinceAliSaga" Sagayeva / Dudayev
